subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Albert Pujols almost single-handedly dismantled the Brewers in Game 2 of the N.L.C.S., collecting four extra-base hits and driving in five runs to lead the Cardinals to a 12-3 victory.
snippet: Albert Pujols almost single-handedly dismantled the Brewers in Game 2 of the N.L.C.S., collecting four extra-base hits and driving in five runs to lead the Cardinals to a 12-3 victory.
